mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lotte.FACE_REGIST_INFO ( userName, userBirthday, userSex, emotion, registDate, faceOriginName, faceFakeName ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{userBirthday}, #{userSex}, #{emotion}, #{registDate}, #{faceOriginName}, #{faceFakeName} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE userName=#{userName}, userBirthday=#{userBirthday}, userSex=#{userSex}, emotion=#{emotion}, registDate=#{registDate}, faceOriginName=#{faceOriginName}, faceFakeName=#{faceFakeName}
